title: Chilli mussels with thyme and tomatoes

ingredients.content: 1 fresh bird's eye chilli, deseeded if preferred

preparations.content: Place mussels into Varoma dish then spread thyme and basil leaves evenly over the top of the mussels. Set Varoma dish with mussels aside.
Place garlic cloves and bird's eye chilli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add canned chopped tomatoes, white wine, lemon juice and vegetable stock paste into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and cook <b>12-15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, until all mussels have opened. Discard any mussels that remain closed after cooking.
Transfer mussels into a large serving bowl, pour over sauce and serve.
